results.content: The description says that we need to have beginner level skills,but there are many advanced property used which was not explained in detail.There are cuts made which shows that the teacher isn't sure about his code.Please add more detail to your code.many students doesn't have experience in gaming understand this and explain the concept step-wise.Thank youu.

response.content: JavaScript knowledge IS a prerequisite to the course, its mentioned many times in the description and in the welcome message.   The code works and is explained step by step and I am sure about the code as it comes from a working model prebuilt before I create the course.  There are cuts to speed up the repetitive items as well as the CSS as this course is about JavaScript and the DOM.  The course is not about game design but about applying JavaScript to become more familiar with the DOM so it would not be teaching game design.
